headline: Does Recent 4.5% Drop Signal a New Opportunity in Expand Energy?
summary: If you have been watching Expand Energy lately and wondering if now is the time to move, you are not alone. After a stellar 21.7% move higher over the past year, the stock has recently hit a patch of turbulence. In the last month alone, shares have pulled back by 4.5% and they are down 4.8% over the last seven days. Year to date, the price is close to even with just a 0.2% dip. This kind of back-and-forth in the price is making a lot of investors ask if the growth story has run out of steam,...

headline: Southwestern Energy: How To Find & Own America's Greatest Opportunities
summary: Southwestern Energy was a big market leader in 2004 and 2005, engaged in the exploration and production of oil and natural gas.
